MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut LL58 postcode area of Beaumaris, affecting properties in Llanddona and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:30PM. Our engineers are on site to investigate and repair the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 10:45PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:50PM on 10th March 2021
